title: Colombia and Venezuela
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South America - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Venezuela - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South America - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Venezuela - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Cross-cultural studies
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Venezuela - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/South America - Social conditions
description: Four sub-regions are determined by the topography of these two South American countries; the climate, the industries, and the population of these are studied - farming, shipping, mining and agriculture - with stress on the contrast between cities and countryside. The different types of people and their work, and the world trading economy of these countries are simply represented with the aid of animation.
